## Description
Solid waste predominantly is any garbage, refuse or rubbish generated in settlement. It can be converted into other wastes.

## Characteristics

| Attribute      | Value |
|--------:|:------|
|Edible:|false|
|Type:|Waste|
|Form:|Solid|
